Title: Guess Hoe's Coming to Dinner
Plot: Huey and Riley try to convince Grandad that his new girlfriend Cristal (like the champagne) is actually a prostitute. Of course, Grandad doesn't believe them, even when she spends all his money. But when A Pimp Named Slickback shows up, the truth is revealed.
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, drug use and sexual content that may offend
